description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters beneath the ocean surface, home to both fish-men and merfolk. The island serves as a gateway to the New World.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats vs New Fish-Man Pirates Battle
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates engage in fierce battles against the New Fish-Man Pirates officers across Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: The massive battle that determines the fate of Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Noah Begins Falling Toward Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The massive ship Noah starts falling directly down toward Fish-Man Island, threatening to destroy the entire kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the main crisis threatening the island's existence.

statusHistory.reason: Under threat from falling Noah but still standing

description: An enormous ship roughly half the size of Fish-Man Island, created during the Void Century. Known as the 'Ship of Promise,' it was built as part of an agreement with Joy Boy to use Poseidon's powers to raise it to the surface.

keyEvents.title: Vander Decken Falls Unconscious Inside Noah
keyEvents.description: Vander Decken IX falls unconscious inside Noah after attempting to throw an axe at Hody Jones, causing his Devil Fruit powers to fail.
keyEvents.significance: Critical moment that triggers Noah's descent toward Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Noah Begins Falling Toward Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: With Decken unconscious, Noah's trajectory changes from targeting Shirahoshi to falling straight down toward Fish-Man Island.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the apocalyptic threat that drives the climax of the arc.

statusHistory.reason: Falling toward Fish-Man Island after Decken's unconsciousness
